org.mt4j.input.inputSources
Class Win7NativeTouchSource

java.lang.Object
  org.mt4j.input.inputSources.AbstractInputSource
      org.mt4j.input.inputSources.Win7NativeTouchSource
All Implemented Interfaces:
IPreDrawAction
public class Win7NativeTouchSource
extends AbstractInputSource

Input source for native Windows 7 WM_TOUCH messages for single/multi-touch.
Be careful to instantiate this class only ONCE!

Author:
C.Ruff

          Instantiates a new win7 native touch source.

isSuccessfullySetup

pre

public void pre()
Description copied from class: AbstractInputSource
The input events have to be fired in processings (and openGL's) thread. Called by processing. This method should not be invoked directly!
